channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Large pothole, 17th May
item.description:
Outside 27/29 tobyfield rd has been a pothole for years and getting bigger
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 27 Tobyfield Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: General building rubbish, 17th May
item.description:
Plasterboard, tiles and door dumped on side of road

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 23 Rivelands Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Appalling series of potholes., 17th May
item.description:
Dangerously poor road surface. Cars swerving to avoid the enormous potholes. Has been like this for years. Why isn’t the road repaired?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Greenway Lane, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Simply awful road conditions., 17th May
item.description:
Series of potholes. Has been like this for 2 years, why don’t you repair it??
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 171 Gloucester Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 100 yards of simply appalling road surface., 17th May
item.description:
This section of road has been awful for at least 2 years. Why don’t you fix it?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: There are multiple serious potholes on this road between the roundabout and the BP garage. The buses and coaches coming from the Marchants depot are causing our house to shake when they go over this dreadful stretch of road., 17th May
item.description:
These potholes have been here for months and are getting worse. The noise they are causing is unacceptable to residents and the vibrations are causing damage to buildings
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 44 Prestbury Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes on Chatsworth Drive, 17th May
item.description:
Multiple pot holes that are increasing in size

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 196 Leckhampton Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken glass, 16th May
item.description:
Broken green glass on the pavement - hazardous for animals. Please could this be cleaned up? Thank you
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 11 Pilley Lane, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Start of cycle path impassable, 16th May
item.description:
Trees/bushes have grown over the path making it dangerous for cyclists and pedestrians due to lack of space/poor visibility

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 7 The Lea, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street lights flashing throughout the night, 16th May
item.description:
This lamp has been continuously flashing throughout the night causing unrest and nuisance to neighbours just behind

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): B4063, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Loads of graffiti/tagging on walls, 16th May
item.description:
Loads of graffiti on walls... This has been a problem for months. A real grot spot in a grotty place I was once proud of. Please clean this town up! Equally as important, catch the offenders!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Douglas House Vittoria Walk, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Japanese Knotweed, 15th May
item.description:
Near the sub-station. On the left, at the bottom of the ramp from the Honeyborne path.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 27 Marsh Gardens, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown pathway, 15th May
item.description:
Weeds, nettles. Just needs strimmimg back

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 4 Briar Walk, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Badly patched pothole, 15th May
item.description:
Previously reported and has been patched several times. Patches don’t last long, and loose tarmac and debris causes damage to surrounding vehicles.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 76 Whaddon Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pothole, 15th May
item.description:
Pothole from badly repaired patch, been here for months.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): St. Michaels Vicarage Severn Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Parking in front of drop kerb, and on a junction., 15th May
item.description:
This bad/inconsiderate parking is happening daily on Sapphire Road. This access road needs to be double yellow line marked.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): The Cleevelands Centre Sapphire Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
